model.board

Class Tile

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.board.Tile
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Buyer, Deal, FamilyCasinoNight, Lottery, Mail, PayDay, RadioContest, Start, Sweepstakes, YardSale

    public abstract class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
    A tile (position/date) on the board.

        position - The position of the tile on the board.

        image - The path for the image of the tile.
